author: KMSP
title: MN weather: Spring snow crashes and spinouts | Flipboard
text: The first round of spring snow created slick road conditions in portions of the state. The Minnesota State Patrol reported 175 crashes and 101 vehicle spinouts from 5 p.m. on Thursday to 6 a.m. on Friday.
